corda / net.corda.core.messaging / CordaRPCOps / stateMachinesAndUpdates

stateMachinesAndUpdates

@RPCReturnsObservables abstract fun stateMachinesAndUpdates(): Pair<List<StateMachineInfo>, Observable<StateMachineUpdate>>

Returns a pair of currently in-progress state machine infos and an observable of future state machine adds/removes.
